snippet: Members of a Mozambican opposition party’s militia killed four police officers in an attack to try to free party members arrested in a police raid on their headquarters.
abstract: Members of Mozambican opposition party’s militia kill four police officers in attack to try to free party members arrested in police raid on their headquarters.
lead_paragraph: Members of a Mozambican opposition party’s militia killed four police officers in an attack to try to free party members arrested in a police raid on their headquarters.
